name: Maximum Traffic Racing
description:
Maximum Traffic Racing is a car driving simulator with realistic controls and smooth dynamic action.
Prove that you can can complete challenging driving exercises and become the master of the steering wheel!

Stay on the road, avoid collision with other cars!
Show your driving skills be fast and agile!

Features

- Full physics controlled traffic with smart AI
- Endless game
- Addictive
- Race Game
- Stunning Graphics
- Handy Controls
- Racer through Traffic

Like us at Facebook and stay tuned with all new games and updates
https://www.facebook.com/smartmovegames
